ClassDecl.Name: GuiScrollView
ClassDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>A control with a vertical scroll bar and a horizontal scroll bar to perform partial viewing.</summary> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: QueryFullSize
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Calculate the full size of the content.</summary> <returns>The full size of the content.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: UpdateView
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Update the visible content using a view bounds. The view bounds is in the space from (0,0) to full size.</summary> <param name="viewBounds">The view bounds.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetSmallMove
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Calculate the small move of the scroll bar.</summary> <returns>The small move of the scroll bar.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetBigMove
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Calculate the big move of the scroll bar.</summary> <returns>The big move of the scroll bar.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GuiScrollView
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Create a control with a specified style provider.</summary> <param name="themeName">The theme name for retriving a default control template.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: CalculateView
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Force to update contents and scroll bars.</summary> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetViewPosition
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the position of the left-top corner of the view bounds.</summary> <returns>The view position.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetViewPosition
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Set the position of the left-top corner of the view bounds.</summary> <param name="value">The position.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetHorizontalScroll
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the horizontal scroll control.</summary> <returns>The horizontal scroll control.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetVerticalScroll
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the vertical scroll control.</summary> <returns>The vertical scroll control.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetHorizontalAlwaysVisible
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Test is the horizontal scroll bar always visible even the content doesn't exceed the view bounds.</summary> <returns>Returns true if the horizontal scroll bar always visible even the content doesn't exceed the view bounds</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetHorizontalAlwaysVisible
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Set is the horizontal scroll bar always visible even the content doesn't exceed the view bounds.</summary> <param name="value">Set to true if the horizontal scroll bar always visible even the content doesn't exceed the view bounds</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetVerticalAlwaysVisible
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Test is the vertical scroll bar always visible even the content doesn't exceed the view bounds.</summary> <returns>Returns true if the vertical scroll bar always visible even the content doesn't exceed the view bounds</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetVerticalAlwaysVisible
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Set is the vertical scroll bar always visible even the content doesn't exceed the view bounds.</summary> <param name="value">Set to true if the vertical scroll bar always visible even the content doesn't exceed the view bounds</param> </Document>
